mcq.statement: Which addition did Aurangzeb make to the Lahore Fort that was later named after him?
mcq.one_liner: Aurangzeb constructed one of the thirteen gates of the Lahore Fort, which was later named the **Alamgiri Gate** after him.

suggestions.topic: Decline: Ahmad Sirhindi, Shah Waliullah, Maratha Empire 1674-1818
